text: Wojciech Jan Borowik (24 June 1956 – 22 December 2020) was a Polish politician. He was a member of the Sejm from 1993 to 1997. Borowik was a member of the Labour Union Party. Borowik died at age 64 on 22 December 2020, from COVID-19, during the pandemic in Poland.Opozycjonista z czasów PRL zmarł na koronawirusa. Żegnają go politycy od Trzaskowskiego po Lichocką ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Poland
title: Wojciech Borowik
